name.description: Name for the siprec connector resource.

host.description: Hostname/IPv4 address of SIPREC SRS to be used

port.description: Port for SIPREC SRS to be used

app_subdomain.description: Sip subdomain to route the call when using Telnyx SRS Not required if non-Telnyx SRS is used.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the resource was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the resource was last updated
